title: New way to ride the tech boom: Help startups with legal issues - Economic Times
content: New way to ride the tech boom: Help startups with legal issues  Economic Times
description: "Since most founders are first-generation entrepreneurs, they lack the financial muscle to assert their legal rights," said LegalPay CEO Kundan Shahi. "The idea behind this product is to create a level playing field for those disgruntled founders so that they don't give up on their legitimate rights due to financial constraints."
